sentences.sContent: Please Jessie, don’t do anything rash.
sentences.sCn: 求你了，杰西，不要草率行事。

sentences.sContent: Don’t go making any rash decisions about your future!
sentences.sCn: 不要对你的未来贸然作决定！

sentences.sContent: It was rather rash of you to lend them your car.
sentences.sCn: 你把汽车借给他们实在有欠考虑。

synos.tran: 轻率的；鲁莽的；不顾后果的
[皮肤]皮疹；突然大量出现的事物

words.tran: 轻率地；鲁莽地；无见识地
轻率；皮肤上短暂出现的疹子

trans.tranCn: 轻率的；鲁莽的；不顾后果的
trans.tranOther: if you are rash, you do things too quickly, without thinking carefully about whether they are sensible or not

trans.tranCn: [皮肤] 皮疹；突然大量出现的事物
trans.tranOther: a lot of red spots on someone’s skin, caused by an illness
